doc:
Kenny Delmar https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kenny_Delmar 0 Kenneth Howard Delmar (born Kenneth Frederick Fay Howard, September 5, 1910, Boston, Massachusetts – July 14, 1984, Stamford, Connecticut) was an American actor active in radio, films, and animation. An announcer on the pioneering radio news series The March of Time, he became a national radio sensation in 1945 as Senator Beauregard Claghorn on Fred Allen's program Allen's Alley. The character Delmar created was a primary inspiration for the Warner Bros. cartoon character Foghorn Leghorn. Kenneth_Howard_Delmar ( born Kenneth_Frederick_Fay_Howard , September_5_,_1910 , Boston , Massachusetts – July_14_,_1984 , Stamford , Connecticut ) was an_American_actor_active in radio , films , and animation . An_announcer on the_pioneering_radio_news_series The_March of Time , he became a_national_radio_sensation in 1945 as Senator_Beauregard_Claghorn on Fred_Allen 's_program_Allen 's_Alley . The_character_Delmar created was a_primary_inspiration for the_Warner_Bros._cartoon_character_Foghorn_Leghorn .
